name: Bloons FPS
description:
Play as a Monkey fighting off waves of Bloons on a Tropical Island by popping them with darts and various other classic weapons!

Upgrade your Monkey to become more powerful with iconic upgrades from the Bloons Tower Defence Series such as:

- Ninja

-Boomerang Thrower

-Crossbow Monkey

-Super Monkey

This is just a prototype I made for fun because I love Bloons Tower Defence and thought it would be cool to throw darts at bloons as a monkey in first person.

CONTROLS

wasd = move

left click = attack

space = jump

f = interact/purchase

r = start next round

esc = pause

mouse = aim/move camera
